Checks whether the filename given is valid or not.
See wiki for more information.

Parameters:
name - name of the file
Returns:
true if the name is valid, and vice versa (if it contains invalid characters or it is null/ empty)

createDeleteFileThread

public static Thread createDeleteFileThread(IFile file,
                                            IFileProvider fileProvider,
                                            boolean recursive)
Deletes a file or directory.

Parameters:
file - IFile
fileProvider - IFileProvider
recursive - if true and file is a directory, browses the directory and deletes all of its sub files
Returns:
the thread which is deleting files
